summary: TRANSMISSION FAILED AT 40,000 MILES, HOWEVER IT WAS UNDER WARRANTY SO THEY FIXED IT AT A COST OF ROUGHLY $6000. NOW  AT 82,000 MILES, THE FLUID IS LEAKING AND THEY ARE ADVISING ME TO PAY FOR A REPLACEMENT FOR ABOUT $4000.  HONDA IS USING THERE GOOD NAME TO SELL A DEFECTIVE PRODUCT AND THE 98-99 V6 ACCORDS NEED TO BE RECALLED ALONG WITH THE 2000-2001. *AK
